summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SoundMirror visual speech articulation training platform. All backend APIs (28/28) and frontend UI components working correctly. Tested 5 pages, language selector, dual head animations, recording panel, and navigation flows.
passed_tests: Backend API health endpoints (root, health check)
Language endpoints (10 languages with translations, alphabets, practice words)
Phoneme mapping and frame conversion endpoints
Practice session CRUD operations
Grading endpoint with mock responses
Bug report submission
Error handling for non-existent resources
Home page with language selector (10 languages)
Practice input field and quick practice words (8 words)
Navigation cards to all pages
Letter Practice page with alphabet keyboard
Dual head animation (front/side views) with PNG sprites from GitHub
Animation controls (play/pause/reset) and frame scrubber
Recording panel with camera placeholder
Word Practice page with word input and submission
History Library page with statistics cards and empty state
Bug Report page with all dropdown selectors and form validation
Navigation between all pages
Language switching functionality (tested English to Spanish)
Splash screen animation on first load
